skyStriker:KagariStance.NAME: Sky Striker Ace-Kagari
DESCRIPTION: Gains 1 ATK for each Spell in your DiscardPile

skyStriker:ShizukuStance.NAME: Sky Striker Ace-Shizuku
DESCRIPTION: All enemy lose 1 ATK for each Spell in your DiscardPile

skyStriker:KainaStance.NAME: Sky Striker Ace-Kaina
DESCRIPTION: Each time you activate "Sky Striker" Spell Card, gain 1 HP

skyStriker:HayateStance.NAME: Sky Striker Ace-Hayate
DESCRIPTION: Ignore Enemy's Block.After attacking send 1 "Sky Striker" card from your Deck to the Discard Pile
